trans-unit.source: Creates a LinearGradientBrush object from a rectangle and boundary colors

seg-source.mrk: Creates a LinearGradientBrush object from a rectangle and boundary colors

target.mrk: Creates a LinearGradientBrush object from a rectangle and boundary colors

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: $tagGDIPRECTF that specifies the starting and ending points of the gradient

seg-source.mrk: $tagGDIPRECTF that specifies the starting and ending points of the gradient

target.mrk: $tagGDIPRECTF that specifies the starting and ending points of the gradient

trans-unit.source: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the starting color of the line

seg-source.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the starting color of the line

target.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the starting color of the line

trans-unit.source: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the ending color of the line

seg-source.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the ending color of the line

target.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of the ending color of the line

trans-unit.source: [optional] The direction of the gradient:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The direction of the gradient:

target.mrk: [optional]
The direction of the gradient:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Horizontal direction from the left of the display to the right of the display

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Horizontal direction from the left of the display to the right of the display

target.mrk: 0 - Horizontal direction from the left of the display to the right of the display

trans-unit.source: 1 - Vertical direction from the top of the display to the bottom of the display

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Vertical direction from the top of the display to the bottom of the display

target.mrk: 1 - Vertical direction from the top of the display to the bottom of the display

trans-unit.source: 2 - Forward diagonal direction from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the display

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Forward diagonal direction from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the display

target.mrk: 2 - Forward diagonal direction from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the display

trans-unit.source: 3 - Backward diagonal direction from the upper-right corner to the lower-left corner of the display

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Backward diagonal direction from the upper-right corner to the lower-left corner of the display

target.mrk: 3 - Backward diagonal direction from the upper-right corner to the lower-left corner of the display

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies how areas filled with the brush are tiled:

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
Specifies how areas filled with the brush are tiled:

target.mrk: [optional]
Specifies how areas filled with the brush are tiled:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Tiling without flipping

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Tiling without flipping

target.mrk: 0 - Tiling without flipping

trans-unit.source: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

target.mrk: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

trans-unit.source: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

target.mrk: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

trans-unit.source: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

target.mrk: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

trans-unit.source: 4 - No tiling takes place

seg-source.mrk: 4 - No tiling takes place

target.mrk: 4 - No tiling takes place

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: a pointer to a new LinearGradientBrush object.

seg-source.mrk: a pointer to a new LinearGradientBrush object.

target.mrk: a pointer to a new LinearGradientBrush object.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.

seg-source.mrk: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.

target.mrk: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.
